required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of TG103 in Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Multicenter, Multiple Ascending Dose Phase Ib Study in Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability and Pharmacokinetic Profile of TG103 Injection

lead_sponsor.agency: CSPC ZhongQi Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: CSPC ZhongQi Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: The main purpose of this study is to assess the safety and tolerability of multiple ascending doses of TG103 in subjects with type 2 diabetes.

detailed_description.textblock: This study is a randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, multicenter, dose-escalating study to characterize the safety (including the anti-drug antibodies(ADA)), tolerability pharmacokinetics (PK) and pharmacodynamic parameters（PD）of TG103. The study will consist of 3 periods: an approximately 2-week lead-in period, followed by a 12-week treatment period, and a 3-week safety follow-up period. Three dose groups (7.5mg, 15mg and 22.5mg) of subjects will be enrolled and dosed sequentially; 12

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Safety and tolerability assessed by incidence and severity of adverse events
primary_outcome.description: A summary of SAEs and other non-serious adverse events (AEs), regardless of causality, will be reported in the Reported Adverse Events module

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve (AUC)
secondary_outcome.description: PK parameters after administration of of TG103
Pharmacodynamic (PD) parameters after administration of of TG103

secondary_outcome.measure: The occurrence of TG103 anti-drug antibodies (ADA)
secondary_outcome.description: AD Aafter administration of of TG103
PK parameters after administration of of TG103
PK parameters after administration of of TG103
PK parameters after administration of of TG103
PK parameters after administration of of TG103

arm_group.description: TG103 will be administered via subcutaneous injection once weekly in subjects with type 2 diabetes.
Placebo will be administered via subcutaneous injection once weekly in subjects with type 2 diabetes.
